channel.title: Fix pking in a zdr base
channel.description: i need help fixing the pking in zdiddyrevival. anybody know what to do? it gives the attack option but in reality it just walks there. problem server sided, i can use client to pk on other servers. fighting npcs works fine, just pking is broken.
